1972 CODE COMPARATIVE TABLE
This table gives the location within this Code of those sections of the 1972 Code, which are included herein. Sections of the 1972 Code not listed herein have been omitted as repealed, superseded, obsolete, or not of a general and permanent nature. For the location of ordinances adopted subsequent thereto, see the table immediately following this table.
EXPAND

this Code
